chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
integrity Z Z.mul 0%Z

Premises:
integrity : forall S : Set, (S -> S -> S) -> S -> Set
N.mul = fun n m : N => match n with | 0%N => 0%N | N.pos p => match m with | 0%N => 0%N | N.pos q => N.pos (p * q) end end : N -> N -> N Arguments N.mul (_ _)%N_scope
Inductive Z : Set := Z0 : Z | Zpos : positive -> Z | Zneg : positive -> Z Arguments Zpos _%positive_scope Arguments Zneg _%positive_scope
ZMicromega.pmul = RingMicromega.pmul 0%Z 1%Z Z.add Z.mul Zeq_bool : EnvRing.Pol Z -> EnvRing.Pol Z -> EnvRing.Pol Z
ZMicromega.normZ = RingMicromega.norm 0%Z 1%Z Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp Zeq_bool : EnvRing.PExpr Z -> EnvRing.Pol Z
ZMicromega.eval_nformula = RingMicromega.eval_nformula 0%Z Z.add Z.mul eq Z.le Z.lt (fun x : Z => x) : RingMicromega.PolEnv Z -> RingMicromega.NFormula Z -> Prop
Zr_ring_lemma1 : forall (n : nat) (l : list Z) (lpe : list (Ring_polynom.PExpr Z * Ring_polynom.PExpr Z)) (pe1 pe2 : Ring_polynom.PExpr Z), Ring_polynom.interp_PElist 0%Z 1%Z Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp eq (IDphi (R:=Z)) Z.of_N Z.pow l lpe ->...-> Ring_polynom.PEeval 0%Z 1%Z Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp (IDphi (R:=Z)) Z.of_N Z.pow l pe1 = Ring_polynom.PEeval 0%Z 1%Z Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp (IDphi (R:=Z)) Z.of_N Z.pow l pe2
ZMicromega.ZWeakChecker = RingMicromega.check_normalised_formulas 0%Z 1%Z Z.add Z.mul Zeq_bool Z.leb : list (RingMicromega.NFormula Z) -> RingMicromega.Psatz Z -> bool Arguments ZMicromega.ZWeakChecker _%list_scope
Zpower_theory = {| rpow_pow_N := fun (r : Z) (n : N) => match n as n0 return ((r ^ Z.of_N n0)%Z = pow_N 1%Z Z.mul r n0) with | 0%N => eq_refl | N.pos p => eq_ind (pow_pos Z.mul r p * 1)%Z (fun z : Z => Pos.iter (Z.mul r) 1%Z p = z) (positive_ind (fun p0 : positive => forall z : Z, Pos.iter (Z.mul r) z p0 = (pow_pos Z.mul r p0 * z)%Z) (fun (p0 : positive) (IHp : forall z : Z, Pos.iter (Z.mul r) z p0 = (pow_pos Z.mul r p0 * z)%Z) (z : Z) => eq_ind_r (fun z0 : Z => (r * z0)%Z = (r * (pow_pos Z.mul r p0 * pow_pos Z.mul r p...
Z.mul_wd = Morphisms.reflexive_proper Z.mul : Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful Z.eq (Morphisms.respectful Z.eq Z.eq)) Z.mul
ZMicromega.eval_Psatz = RingMicromega.eval_Psatz 0%Z 1%Z Z.add Z.mul Zeq_bool Z.leb : list (RingMicromega.NFormula Z) -> ZMicromega.ZWitness -> option (RingMicromega.NFormula Z) Arguments ZMicromega.eval_Psatz _%list_scope
Z_ring = conj (fun x y : Z => eq_sym (Z.add_comm y x)) (conj Z_group (conj (fun (x y : Z) (_ : IdZ x) (_ : IdZ y) => I) (conj (fun x y z : Z => Z.mul_assoc x y z) (fun x y z : Z => conj (Z.mul_add_distr_r x y z) (Z.mul_add_distr_l x y z))))) : is_ring Z IdZ Z.add Z.mul 0%Z Z.opp
Zth = {| Radd_0_l := Z.add_0_l; Radd_comm := Z.add_comm; Radd_assoc := Z.add_assoc; Rmul_1_l := Z.mul_1_l; Rmul_comm := Z.mul_comm; Rmul_assoc := Z.mul_assoc; Rdistr_l := Z.mul_add_distr_r; Rsub_def := fun x y : Z => eq_refl; Ropp_def := Z.sub_diag |} : ring_theory 0%Z 1%Z Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp eq
ZifyInst.SatProd = {| ZifyClasses.PArg1 := fun x : Z => (0 <= x)%Z; ZifyClasses.PArg2 := fun y : Z => (0 <= y)%Z; ZifyClasses.PRes := fun r : Z => (0 <= r)%Z; ZifyClasses.SatOk := Z.mul_nonneg_nonneg |} : ZifyClasses.Saturate Z.mul
Ztriv_div_th : forall (R : Type) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req -> forall zphi : Z -> R, div_theory req Z.add Z.mul zphi Z.quotrem
BinIntDef.Z.abs = fun z : Z => match z with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos p | Z.neg p => Z.pos p end : Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.abs _%Z_scope
BinIntDef.Z.pow = fun x y : Z => match y with | 0%Z => 1%Z | Z.pos p => BinIntDef.Z.pow_pos x p | Z.neg _ => 0%Z end : Z -> Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.pow (_ _)%Z_scope
BinIntDef.Z.sgn = fun z : Z => match z with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos _ => 1%Z | Z.neg _ => (-1)%Z end : Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.sgn _%Z_scope
BinIntDef.Z.opp = fun x : Z => match x with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos x0 => Z.neg x0 | Z.neg x0 => Z.pos x0 end : Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.opp _%Z_scope
BinIntDef.Z.mul = fun x y : Z => match x with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos x' => match y with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x' * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x' * y') end | Z.neg x' => match y with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos y' => Z.neg (x' * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.pos (x' * y') end end : Z -> Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.mul (_ _)%Z_scope
ZMicromega.max_var_psatz = fix max_var_psatz (w : RingMicromega.Psatz Z) : positive := match w with | RingMicromega.PsatzSquare p => ZMicromega.max_var 1 (EnvRing.Psquare 0%Z 1%Z Z.add Z.mul Zeq_bool p) | RingMicromega.PsatzMulC p w0 => Pos.max (ZMicromega.max_var 1 p) (max_var_psatz w0) | RingMicromega.PsatzMulE w1 w2 | RingMicromega.PsatzAdd w1 w2 => Pos.max (max_var_psatz w1) (max_var_psatz w2) | _ => 1%positive end : RingMicromega.Psatz Z -> positive
BinIntDef.Z.sqrt = fun n : Z => match n with | Z.pos p => Z.pos (Pos.sqrt p) | _ => 0%Z end : Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.sqrt _%Z_scope
BinIntDef.Z.add = fun x y : Z => match x with | 0%Z => y | Z.pos x' => match y with | 0%Z => x | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x' + y') | Z.neg y' => BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub x' y' end | Z.neg x' => match y with | 0%Z => x | Z.pos y' => BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub y' x' | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x' + y') end end : Z -> Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.add (_ _)%Z_scope
BinIntDef.Z.testbit = fun a n : Z => match n with | 0%Z => BinIntDef.Z.odd a | Z.pos p => match a with | 0%Z => false | Z.pos a0 => Pos.testbit a0 (N.pos p) | Z.neg a0 => negb (N.testbit (Pos.pred_N a0) (N.pos p)) end | Z.neg _ => false end : Z -> Z -> bool Arguments BinIntDef.Z.testbit (_ _)%Z_scope
BinIntDef.Z.div_eucl = fun a b : Z => match a with | 0%Z => (0%Z, 0%Z) | Z.pos a' => match b with | 0%Z => (0%Z, 0%Z) | Z.pos _ => BinIntDef.Z.pos_div_eucl a' b | Z.neg b' => let (q, r) := BinIntDef.Z.pos_div_eucl a' (Z.pos b') in match r with | 0%Z => ((- q)%Z, 0%Z) | _ => ((- (q + 1))%Z, (b + r)%Z) end end | Z.neg a' => match b with | 0%Z => (0%Z, 0%Z) | Z.pos _ => let (q, r) := BinIntDef.Z.pos_div_eucl a' b in match r with | 0%Z => ((- q)%Z, 0%Z) | _ =>...
BinIntDef.Z.odd = fun z : Z => match z with | 0%Z | Z.pos (_~0)%positive | Z.neg (_~0)%positive => false | _ => true end : Z -> bool Arguments BinIntDef.Z.odd _%Z_scope
simplification_integrity : forall (S : Set) (A : S -> Prop) (Add Mult : S -> S -> S) (O I : S) (Opp : S -> S), is_unitary_commutative_ring S A Add Mult O I Opp -> integrity S Mult O -> forall a x : S, A a -> A x -> a <> O -> Mult a x = a -> x = I
BinIntDef.Z.quot2 = fun z : Z => match z with | Z.pos ((_~1)%positive as p) | Z.pos ((_~0)%positive as p) => Z.pos (Pos.div2 p) | Z.neg ((_~1)%positive as p) | Z.neg ((_~0)%positive as p) => Z.neg (Pos.div2 p) | _ => 0%Z end : Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.quot2 _%Z_scope
BinIntDef.Z.quotrem = fun a b : Z => match a with | 0%Z => (0%Z, 0%Z) | Z.pos a0 => match b with | 0%Z => (0%Z, a) | Z.pos b0 => let (q, r) := N.pos_div_eucl a0 (N.pos b0) in (BinIntDef.Z.of_N q, BinIntDef.Z.of_N r) | Z.neg b0 => let (q, r) := N.pos_div_eucl a0 (N.pos b0) in ((- BinIntDef.Z.of_N q)%Z, BinIntDef.Z.of_N r) end | Z.neg a0 => match b with | 0%Z => (0%Z, a) | Z.pos b0 => let (q, r) := N.pos_div_eucl a0 (N.pos b0) in ((- BinIntDef.Z.of_N q)%Z, (- BinIntDef.Z.of_N r)%Z)...
Zdiv_eucl_extended : forall b : Z, b <> 0%Z -> forall a : Z, {qr : Z * Z | let (q, r) := qr in a = (b * q + r)%Z /\ (0 <= r < Z.abs b)%Z}
Zdiv_rest_aux = fun '(q, r, d) => (match q with | 0%Z => (0%Z, r) | Z.pos (n~1)%positive => (Z.pos n, (d + r)%Z) | Z.pos (n~0)%positive => (Z.pos n, r) | 1%Z => (0%Z, (d + r)%Z) | Z.neg (n~1)%positive => ((Z.neg n - 1)%Z, (d + r)%Z) | Z.neg (n~0)%positive => (Z.neg n, r) | -1%Z => ((-1)%Z, (d + r)%Z) end, (2 * d)%Z) : Z * Z * Z -> Z * Z * Z
BinIntDef.Z.compare = fun x y : Z => match x with | 0%Z => match y with | 0%Z => Eq | Z.pos _ => Lt | Z.neg _ => Gt end | Z.pos x' => match y with | Z.pos y' => (x' ?= y')%positive | _ => Gt end | Z.neg x' => match y with | Z.neg y' => CompOpp (x' ?= y')%positive | _ => Lt end end : Z -> Z -> comparison Arguments BinIntDef.Z.compare (_ _)%Z_scope
BinIntDef.Z.of_N = fun n : N => match n with | 0%N => 0%Z | N.pos p => Z.pos p end : N -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.of_N _%N_scope
